description: ff. 109. 210 x 155; 160 x 115 mm. 17 lin. autograph, Ṣafar 923. After having completed his Muntakhab al-zamān fī tārīkh al-khulafāʼ wa-al-umarāʼ wa-al-aʻyān (cf. Brockelmann, GAL, S II, 406, 1b, no. 2) which is a chronicle from the birth of the Prophet down to the authorʼs days, he came across a book (the title and author of which are not mentioned) dealing with cosmography and pre-Islamic history. This work he abridged, gave the abridgment the title ʻUmdat al-ʻārifīn etc. and made it the first part of his Muntakhab al-zamān. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الاول قبل کل مخلوقات ... اما بعد فانى لما صنفت کتابى ... منتخب الزمان
author: Ibn al-ḥarīrī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī, d. ca. 1520

title.@value: ʻUmdat al-ʻārifīn fī qiṣaṣ al-nabīyīn wa-al-umam al-sālifīn.

creator: Ibn al-ḥarīrī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī, d. ca. 1520
subject: Prophets, Pre-Islamic—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
